HTMLAllCollectionItem.summary: The item() method of the interface returns the element located at the specified offset into the collection, or the element with the specified value for its id or name attribute.
HTMLAllCollectionItem.returns: If nameOrIndex represents an index, item() returns the at the specified index, or null if nameOrIndex is less than zero or greater than or equal to the length property. If nameOrIndex represents a name, item() returns the same value as .
